translated: Do they not say that the penetration of the known, etc., is penetration, and is that not supramundane? â€”It is not so because the known, etc., are not called penetration by the mere word â€œpenetration.â€ Or else, because it is the cause of penetration, the knowledge that occurs in the earlier stage in regard to suffering, etc., as the known, etc., is called â€œpenetration,â€ not because it is penetration.
